context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Confluence skill to create a new page from Markdown content. The solution must call create_page with a properly converted body and handle both parent page placement and format conversion for the target deployment type.

checklist.name: create_page called
checklist.description: The solution calls create_page with the space key, title, and body arguments, or invokes confluence.py 'page create' with the equivalent flags

checklist.name: Markdown converted to Atlassian format
checklist.description: The Markdown body is converted to ADF using markdown_to_adf for Cloud deployments, or to XHTML storage format using markdown_to_storage for DataCenter/Server, before being passed to create_page

checklist.name: Page URL or ID returned
checklist.description: After creation, the solution extracts and outputs the new page's URL or numeric ID from the API response

checklist.name: Parent page supported
checklist.description: When a parent page identifier is provided, it is passed as the parent_id argument to create_page, establishing the correct hierarchy in the Confluence space
